abstract: Peter Kizenko, the chief equity trader in Goldman Sachs's Moscow office, is leaving the firm to finish building a Russian sauna, known as a banya, in New Jersey, Bloomberg reports. After a turn in a steam room, banyagoers typically "beat one another with birch or pine branches before plunging into cold water or rolling in snow to cool down."
